title: Adjust Bids in Google Ads
description: An SEM manager needs to increase bids for high-performing keywords and decrease them for low-performing ones.

tasks.description: Pull a keyword performance report for the last 30 days, including conversion rate.
Identify keywords with a conversion rate above the campaign average and increase their bids by 15%.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully increases bids for the top-performing keywords.

tasks.description: Identify keywords with zero conversions and significant spend, and decrease their bids by 20%.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully decreases bids for the poor-performing keywords.
